group_1.textLeft: But, what you said about informing people@about my condition...
That itself I believe is a good initiative.
...Though it is slowly but surely gaining recognition,
it is still much too difficult to understand...
For children with similar conditions@it is imperative they understand their surroundings.
I do still have a desire to let as many people@as possible come to understand it...
...even now...

group_1.textRight: ...Yeah, got it!

group_1.textLeft: Thank you very much.

group_1.textRight: But, what do I do...?
There's enough stuff to make the newspaper@as it is now,
but it feels like the details are left out a little,@doesn't it...?

group_1.textLeft: Indeed it does...@It seems to be a little plain for a news article.

group_1.textRight: Yeah...
If I'm going through all this work,@I want more interesting things in it.
...Maybe it doesn't have enough pizzazz?

group_1.textLeft: Now that you mention it,@we haven't taken many photos or videos.
After all, housework itself is work.
It's just that despite the difficulty of such work,@it does not look well for an article.
...That's true.
...Then why don't we try some housework@that is more "newsworthy"?

group_1.textRight: You mean from Super Servant Rabitan?!

group_1.textLeft: That is what I mean.

group_1.textRight: Whaaat?! Show Mii, show Mii!@[wait:0.8][chara:103801:cheek_0][chara:103801:face_mtn_ex_050.exp3.json]Oh, can I record video too?!

group_1.textLeft: You may.

group_1.textRight: Hooray!
The kitchen...@You mean you are going to cook?

group_1.textLeft: Yes, I was thinking of making lunch.

group_1.textRight: So how're you going to make it look cool?

group_1.textLeft: It's not...that exciting to watch,
but I will try my best.

group_1.textRight: Okayー! Then I'm turning the camera on!
Here Nayutan, take over.

group_1.textLeft: Oh, I'm the one recording?!

group_1.textRight: Aaand, action!
Ms. Super Servant!
What's on the menu for lunch today?

group_1.textLeft: Stir-fry and salmon sauté.
I will also be serving a few things made in advance.

group_1.textRight: Then without further ado,@please begin your cooking!

group_1.textLeft: Right.

group_1.textRight: Woahhh! Rabitan's so fast!
Rabitan, were you always this good at cooking?

group_1.textLeft: Well... I have trained for it.
But it's only recently that I've become this fast.

group_1.textRight: Since you started assisting Nayutan, you mean?

group_1.textLeft: Yes.
Quickly preparing breakfast to wake Lady Nayuta,
or situations like this morning's milk@that happen so often,
it's necessary for me to manage my time carefully@to cover for such things.

group_1.textRight: Ah! Hold it, Nayutan!@Don't be shaking the camera!
